review: The fire stick works fine. I would like too have seen a better write up to get started.
author: Mrs. Gale E Carroll

review: Really like it. It was easy to set up and we were using it within minutes of plugging it in.It would have been 5 stars except that there was a lot more content than I expected that you have to pay for. Still a great value though!
author: Cheryl

review: Great product and my kids can easily use it as well!
author: M. Libertini

review: On par with all similar products. ..but offers Prime content...and convenience.
author: Jesseo

review: The fire stick is amazing.. Love it!
author: Charlotte Rickman

review: Great product, great value.  Only thing keeping me from giving it a fifth star is the remote: a keypad would be nice.
author: Christopher Cawley

review: Pretty impressed, I think this is going to be my pick of the litter between my Chromecast, Xbox One, and a Roku 2 XS.  It's fast, pretty and has the apps I want.  It is a bit Amazon heavy in the home page, but it's simple to just scroll down to my Apps to use Plex, Hulu, SlingTV, etc...
author: Levi Smith
